text: Brown Lindiwe Mkhize (born Durban, South Africa) is a South African singer and actress. ==Theatre productions== *The Lion King (London) - Rafiki *The Lion King (Dallas) (Los Angeles) - Rafiki *Hairspray (Australia) - Motormouth Maybelle *The Lion King (Madrid) - Rafiki == References == The Lion King Movie (Singing Circle of Life) Category:Musicians from Durban Category:South African female singers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Actors from Durban
title: Brown Lindiwe Mkhize
